item.title: CVE-2024-30239|2024-08-08T18:21:20.217Z -- zoho%20campaigns -- zoho%20campaigns
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Special Elements used in an SQL Command ('SQL Injection') vulnerability in Zoho Campaigns.This issue affects Zoho Campaigns: from n/a through 2.0.6.
